ship.name: Maquis Raider
ship.flavor: A small and manueverable ship, favored by the Maquis for quick escapes and durability under hostile pursuit.

ship.name: Klingon K'Vort Bird-of-Prey
ship.flavor: A versatile craft often used for scouting and patrolling. The K'Vort-class is the most stable iteration of this design.

ship.name: Nova Class
ship.flavor: Designed for short-term missions of science and exploration. Features advanced sensor arrays.

ship.name: Jem'Hadar Fighter
ship.flavor: A warship used by the soldier species of the Dominion. Equipped with phased polaron beam weapons

ship.name: Val Jean
ship.flavor: A Maquis raider commanded by Chakotay. This vessel was destroyed after colliding with the Caretaker's array.

ship.name: Hirogen Hunter Ship
ship.flavor: Small but heavily-armed, these vessels are equipped to allow for efficient hunting and processing of game.

ship.name: Borg Sphere
ship.flavor: Borg spheres were primarily scout and long-range tactical vessels. Borg cubes sometimes housed Borg spheres as auxillary craft.

ship.name: Suurok Class Combat Cruiser
ship.flavor: Used as both a Combat Cruiser or a Science Vessel, the Suurok Class was among the fastest and most powerful starships operating in the Vulcan fleet.

ship.name: Miranda Class Ship
ship.flavor: Miranda Class

ship.name: Romulan Valdore-type Warbird
ship.flavor: Valdore-type Warbird

ship.name: Galaxy Class Ship
ship.flavor: One of the largest and most powerful classes of ship in Starfleet's history.

ship.name: Defiant-Class Ship
ship.flavor: Named after the initial prototype, brought into production during the Dominion War to serve as warships.

ship.name: Intrepid-Class Ship
ship.flavor: Designed for long-term exploration. Able to land on the surface of a planet and powered by bio-neural gel packs.

ship.name: Constitution Class Ship
ship.flavor: The face of Starfleet in the 23rd century, these heavy cruisers were designed for long-term missions.

ship.name: Cardassian Galor Cruiser
ship.flavor: The "foot soldier" of the Cardassian Union, nimble and destructive. Features multiple phaser arrays.

ship.name: Ferengi D'Kora Marauder
ship.flavor: An enigmatic vessel used for battle and transport. Capable of disabling a deflector shield.

ship.name: NX-Class Ship
ship.flavor: The first Starfleet ships to be equipped with warp five engines, allowing exploration beyond neighboring star systems.

ship.name: Klingon K't'inga Battlecruiser
ship.flavor: A follow up to the powerful D7 Battlecruiser, the K't'inga Class was the primary warship of the Klingon Empire in the late 23rd century.

ship.name: Terran Empire Constellation Class
ship.flavor: The Constellation Class was a Terran Empire Battle Cruiser that entered service in the late 23rd century.

ship.name: U.S.S. Enterprise NCC-1701-D
ship.flavor: A Galaxy-class vessel famously commanded by Captain Picard. Allows for saucer separation in emergency situations.

ship.name: U.S.S. Enterprise NCC-1701
ship.flavor: A Constitution-class vessel made legend under the command of Captain Kirk. A hardy ship that survived many encounters.

ship.name: U.S.S. Defiant
ship.flavor: Initially created for use against the Borg. Equipped with ablative armor and Starfleet's first legal cloaking device.

ship.name: U.S.S. Voyager
ship.flavor: A Intrepid-class vessel notable for being the first to explore the Delta Quadrant--if not by choice.

ship.name: Romulan D'deridex Warbird
ship.flavor: One of the largest and most advanced vessels in the quadrant. Utilizes a forced quantum singularity as a power source.

ship.name: Hirogen Warship
ship.flavor: Small but heavily-armed, these vessels are equipped to allow for efficient hunting and processing of game.

ship.name: Borg Sphere 878
ship.flavor: Commandeered by General Kotok and other rebel Borg members of Unimatrix Zero in 2377.

ship.name: I.S.S. Avenger
ship.flavor: Registered NX-09, the I.S.S Avenger NX-Class Battleship served alongside the I.S.S. Enterprise in the 22nd Century. It met its demise at the hands of the U.S.S Defiant.

ship.name: La Sirena
ship.flavor: A Kaplan F17 Speed Freighter for hire, captained by Rios. Supplemented with a variety of Holoprograms to assist across a variety of dangerous emergency situations.

ship.name: Tholian Ship
ship.flavor: Equipped with an energy-dampener and the ability to create the infamous Tholian web, a near impenetrable tractor field.

ship.name: Generational NX-01 Enterprise
ship.flavor: Finding themselves stranded in the 21st century, the Enterprise crew embarked on a multi-generational journey to prevent their past from yet again becoming the Enterprise's future.

ship.name: U.S.S. T'Kumbra
ship.flavor: Commanded by the decorated Captain Solok, this all-Vulcan crewed Nebula-class was at the front lines of the Dominion War.

ship.name: Harrad-Sar's Barge
ship.flavor: While pretending to command a mining vessel, Harrad-Sar launched an operation to seize control of the Enterprise and deliver it into Orion hands.

ship.name: Malon Export Vessel
ship.flavor: A volatile waste transport ship with a notoriously low life expectancy for its crew.

ship.name: U.S.S. Yeager
ship.flavor: During the Dominion War this light cruiser was often used to protect Deep Space Nine.

ship.name: Karemma Ship
ship.flavor: A vessel used by the Karemma, a Gamma Quadrant species and part of the Dominion. Equipped with unique defense and attack systems.

ship.name: Borg Cube
ship.flavor: A smaller version of the Collective's ubiquitous and fearsome cubical spacecraft. Features self-repairing systems.

ship.name: H.M.S. Bounty
ship.flavor: A Klingon bird-of-prey commandeered by Admiral James T. Kirk. Ironically named Bounty by CMO Leonard "Bones" McCoy.

ship.name: I.S.S. Enterprise NCC-1701
ship.flavor: A Constitution-class vessel made legend under the command of Captain Kirk. A hardy ship that survived many encounters.

ship.name: D'Kora Krayton
ship.flavor: An enigmatic vessel used for battle and transport. Capable of disabling a deflector shield.

ship.name: Prakesh
ship.flavor: Gul Dukat's Galor Class vessel, famed for its service in the Klingon-Cardassian War.

ship.name: NX-01 Enterprise
ship.flavor: The flagship of United Earth Starfleet, pivotal in founding the Coalition of Planets, a precursor to the UFP.

ship.name: IKS T'Ong
ship.flavor: A K't'inga Class Klingon Battlecruiser, the I.K.S T'Ong gained fame while on a crucial mission under the command of Captain K'Temoc.

ship.name: U.S.S. Shenzhou
ship.flavor: A Walker-class vessel involved in the Battle at the Binary Stars. Ship motto - 'All existing things are really one.'

ship.name: U.S.S. Discovery
ship.flavor: A pioneering science vessel, the crew of U.S.S. Discovery developed a method to safely traverse great distances in an instant with her spore drive.

ship.name: Klingon Sarcophagus
ship.flavor: Flagship of the House of T'Kuvma, the Sarcophagus was armored by thousands of caskets containing remains of Klingon warriors known as the 'Black Fleet'.

ship.name: I.S.S. Defiant
ship.flavor: Based on plans taken from the Prime Universe, the I.S.S. Defiant was built and commanded by Mirror 'Smiley' O'Brien to lead the insurgency against Regent Worf.

ship.name: Andorian Battlecruiser Kumari
ship.flavor: A first of its kind Andorian Battlecruiser named after the first ice-cutter to circumnavigate Andoria.

ship.name: Orion Syndicate Interceptor
ship.flavor: A moderately armed ship used by the Orion Syndicate.

ship.name: Ni'Var
ship.flavor: The Ni'Var was sent by Vulcan High Command to transfer Subcommander T'Pol after her involvement in the destruction of the Vulcan Monastery on P'Jem.

ship.name: U.S.S Reliant
ship.flavor: U.S.S Reliant

ship.name: The Valdore
ship.flavor: A Valdore-type Romulan Warbird, The Valdore battled alongside the U.S.S. Enterprise against the Reman warbird the Scimitar at the battle in the Bassen Rift.

ship.name: Captain Proton Rocket Ship
ship.flavor: The heroic Captain Proton uses this heavily-armed rocket ship to defend Earth against dastardly villains!

ship.name: U.S.S. Enterprise NCC-1701-A
ship.flavor: The second Federation ship to bear the name "Enterprise," this Constitution-class vessel is equipped with improved tactical modifications and boasts a powerful warp core drive.

ship.name: Xindi-Insectoid Patrol Ship
ship.flavor: This small starship used by the Xindi-Insectoids is equipped with multiple directed energy-weapon emitters. As a Patrol ship, it is best known for its speed and maneuverability.

ship.name: The Scimitar
ship.flavor: A heavily-armed warship constructed by Shinzon for the sole purpose of overthrowing the Romulan Empire.

ship.name: U.S.S. Enterprise NCC-1701-E
ship.flavor: A Sovereign-class starship, which, after defeating a Borg Cube, went back in time to prevent the Borg from interfering with humanity's first contact with the Vulcans.

ship.name: Cardassian Keldon Class
ship.flavor: A Cardassian warship used during the 24th century, some of which were secretly enhanced with cloaking under the Obsidian Order and the Romulan Tal Shiar.

ship.name: Assimilated Voyager
ship.flavor: After an attack from a Species 8472 vessel, the Borg Cube defends the Voyager. Janeway agrees to a temporary alliance with the Borg, beginning with the Voyager's assimilation.

ship.name: Federation Fighter
ship.flavor: The cutting edge Federation Fighter first saw major action in the battle against Control at Xahea.

ship.name: The Artifact
ship.flavor: This Borg vessel is severed from the Collective and hosted both research and rehabilitation for xBs. Now active, its queencell, Borg population, and repair systems are engaged.

ship.name: Krenim Weapon Ship
ship.flavor: Developed by Annorax to remove threats to the Krenim Empire via manipulation of the space-time continuum.

ship.name: IKS Negh'Var
ship.flavor: A Klingon warship commanded by General Martok. It spearheaded an attack on Deep Space Nine, an act which dissolved the Federation-Klingon alliance.

ship.name: Borg Queen's Vessel
ship.flavor: The Borg utilize this vessel to transport the Borg Queen within a shielded chamber that is still capable of immense destruction on the vanguard of assimilation efforts.

ship.name: Warship Voyager
ship.flavor: According to the Kyrian Heritage, this warship commanded by the brutal Captain Janeway terrorized the Kyrian people with biogenic weapons.

ship.name: I.S.S. Discovery
ship.flavor: Captained by the fearsome Sylvia "Killy" Tilly, the I.S.S. Discovery was destroyed by Klingon forces upon arrival in the prime universe.

ship.name: U.S.S. Prometheus
ship.flavor: This prototypal Federation ship's experimental assault modes and warp factor 9.99 capability made it a priority target for Romulan hijackers.

ship.name: U.S.S. Excelsior
ship.flavor: The first Starfleet vessel to be fitted with a transwarp drive, the Excelsior was later commanded by Captain Sulu.

ship.name: Xindi-Aquatic Cruiser
ship.flavor: This sleek hydrodynamic starship is the largest and most advanced ship of any of the various Xindi species.

ship.name: NX-02 Columbia
ship.flavor: Commanded by Captain Hernandez, the second NX-Class ship featured a warp five engine with improved hull plating and a changed weapon loadout compared to its predecessor.

ship.name: U.S.S. Glenn
ship.flavor: Sister ship to the U.S.S. Discovery, the crew of the Glenn took greater risks in order to develop their spore drive more quickly, which would eventually prove disastrous.

ship.name: U.S.S. Roddenberry
ship.flavor: This timeless style of ship still finds service in the Federation, providing valuable lessons and experiences to crew members new and old.

ship.name: U.S.S. Raven
ship.flavor: This Raven-type exploration vessel carried Magnus and Erin Hansen with their daughter Annika - the first humans to make contact with the Borg.

ship.name: U.S.S. Phoenix
ship.flavor: A Nebula-class vessel commanded by Captain Maxwell who turned vigilante destroying a Cardassian outpost and several ships in Sector 21505.

ship.name: U.S.S. Hiawatha
ship.flavor: A 23rd century medical frigate that was lost during the Federation-Klingon War.
